item.title: 4 data structures in Python
item.description: Tuple Tuples are used to store multiple items in a single variable.

item.title: Creating multiple subplots using plt.subplots
item.description: pyplot.subplots creates a figure and a grid of subplots with a single call, while providing reasonable control over how the individual plots are created.
